titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President has failed to adequately develop and execute a strategy capable of defeating the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria and a significant course correction is necessary at this time to ensure the protection of the people of the United States and United States allies.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President has failed to adequately develop and execute a strategy capable of defeating the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria and a significant course correction is necessary at this time to ensure the protection of the people of the United States and United States allies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Expresses belief that the President has failed to develop and execute a strategy capable of defeating the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) and a significant course correction is necessary to ensure the protection of the people of the United States and U.S. allies.
